title: Sexuality
content:
What do you think is a morally (Obviously not adhering only to a Christian perspective) correct sexuality? Do you beleive that any form of sexual intercourse outside of vaginal man with a woman sex is immoral?

What's your opinion on pedophilia, homosexuality, masacism, or any such fettist/sexual abnormalities?
(Although, Froyd, I beleive, argued that the only abnormal sexual preference is to have none).

Basically, thoughts?~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

Anyways; about the first question, really not sure. Personally I don't find the idea of oral sex or such very tempting, but it being immoral, don't know about that.

The different paraphilias are quite interesting in my opinion, although with that I don't mean I personally have them. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] Some of them are entirely wrong on my list, but generally I don't consider all of them or different fetishes bad. For example, if someone would prefer doing it only underwater, what's the big deal?
See: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paraphilia]en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paraphilia[/url]

Of the ones you listed, I think pedophilia is entirely wrong. Generally I consider wrong all the acts that are towards people that aren't of your age, or are a lot older than you, if the other is physically abnormal, unconscious, dead, forced to something, rape etc.. Generally wouldn't consider anything physically dangerous to oneself or either to someone else being very good. Oh, and forgot animals. Humanoids are fine. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Sexuality
content:
1.) Concerning natural sex:

Vaginal mf is the only natural, but that doesn't mean it is the only moral. However, a lot of what is today acceptable I find disgusting. [Not say, homosexual, but the more interesting multiple penetrative positions that fill my inbox inviting me to view them.]

2.) Concerning immoral sex:

Anything done without a participants consent [rape in all its forms, drugging, cocerion, etc.] or anything done purely for commercial gain. I also dislike sex for sex's sake, it feels too much to me like turning a pleasurable and personal act into something like taking drugs, you do it because its something mildly pleasant to pass the time.

3.) On Pedophillia and homosexuality

Just because its this, doesn't mean its all bad, but doesn't mean its all good either. Everything has grey areas. Otherwise, I'm broadly supportive.

4.) On sexual fetishes and abnormalities

Abnormalities by their definition are abnormal and I hate them. Fetishes I'm so-so on. If a fetish involves harm to another being [viewing child porn, zoophilia, crush flicks.] unreasonable personal harm or emotinal harm to oneself or others, or undue stress in life [where a fetish begins to control a persons life like an addiction to smoking] then they should get help.

5.) On having no sexual preference.

Freud sucks! He was a fraud, paranoid, faked his data and an overall a$$hole!

Aside from that, those with no sexual preference [Asexuals] are heavily discriminated against in society today. So you can like on sex, the other, or both, but not neither? Even religions imply that no sex has to be worked at, is an unatural state reached through an effort of will. These people are called frigid, geeks, not gtting any, and worse. It seems inconcievable to people today that yes, there are people who aren't nterested in sex, who can have a relationship outside the bedroom. Societies attitude to these people makes me sick!

:/rant

title: Asexuality
content:
Asexuality is definitely a very good thing in my opinion. Those who are asexual can be proud of it. The common attitude towards them is rather negative, too bad. But that's probably because today sex sells. Media is targeted and brands/crap are sold for sexuals mostly, thus making the public opinion like that. Today it's told everywhere that sex is something special and important, although it's neither. These days it's "love = sex".
If there is no sex, or not once a day, the relationship isn't good or the other is gay and not interested. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] This picture one can easily get from the surrounding 'culture'.
The reason I always blame media, advertising, and brands is that I really think they have a huge impact on people. They really define opinions.
The whole thing is overrated, if I'd ever find a female friend it'd be more than nice if she were completely asexual. Most asexuals don't just want the sex part, but still want a relationship. For them the relationship is based on love rather than to sex as opposed in many sexual ones. Sex is too important for many sexuals; I wouldn't call it much of love if one is ready leave the other if for some reason they don't have sex anymore, the love is just sex's side product for them.
Anyways, I hope nobody keeps asexuals as a threat for some reason. I can understand perfectly how someone can thing sex is disgusting (although many asexuals don't find it exactly disgusting, just not something they'd like to do), it's rather grotesque when you think about it; having your own body parts pushed inside some other person (or some other thing in worst case), sweat, fluids.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

Peoples denial off this condition really pisses me off, my brother is asexual, and it has caused him no end of troubble, especially since the local gay group tried to 'convert' him, believing he was really gay.

"Darwinism:
The un-proven proof


In this day and age, many people believe in evolution. There are actually many different theories that people have grouped together under the title of Evolution. Most evolutionists believe in Darwinism, but their beliefs do not contain any scientific proof. If there is no proof for Darwinism, then why do scientists believe in it? This paper will point out the some of the biggest scientific errors in the theories of atheistic evolution and Darwinism. It will also explain why you cannot trust this evolving belief.

&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp First, there are many versions of evolution. Most Christian evolutionists believe that God created everything and then set everything in motion. They believe that God steps in throughout history to keep things going. However, Darwinism rejects the role that God plays in creation. Darwinists are atheists who believe that everything came from nothing.

&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp The atheistic theory that everything came from nothing has already been disproved. If a natural environment wanted to create life, first it would have to create protein; these are the building blocks of life. To do so, it must make amino acids. If it did, it would need to sort the left-handed amino acids from the right-handed. Then the environment would have to string around 100 amino acids together in the right shape, and Walla! One protein! But then the environment would need to protect them from UV rays, oxygen, calcium, and other chemicals otherwise the protein will spoil. In fact, 2,000 different proteins are needed to have enough protein for a one-celled organism!

&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp If the earth wanted to make DNA, it first would need a special protein in order for the DNA to survive. This protein is created by the DNA, but DNA needs the protein before it will reproduce. No human scientist has ever created DNA, much less studied its every detail. In addition, the DNA of one species is completely different from DNA in another species (for example, a human baby has different DNA than a puppy). This is just the tip of the iceberg; the earth would also have to make brains for most of its creatures, and the chance of that is very impossible. The brain can think creatively; it was not made by accident. Therefore, the theory of atheistic evolution fails.

&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp Likewise, Darwinisms theology does not contain any scientific proof. Darwinism states that there is an in-between stage, a stage in which one animal is halfway evolved into another species. However, this is not scientifically true. No one has ever discovered even one true fossil that contains evidence of this stage. Another element of Darwinism states that because almost all creatures have five fingers, toes, and bones in flippers and wings, that they must be all related. Wrong! In different species the bones branch off in different parts of the hand. This could not have happened simply due to adaptation.

&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp Darwinism also states that matter and energy came from nothing. But something cannot come from nothing. Matter and energy could not have been created naturally, so it must have been made supernaturally. For example, a beach will never turn its sand into glasses, and fill the glasses with water from the sea. Someone needs to do that, it cannot happen by itself. The glasses are so much less complex than DNA or the brain. This could not have happened Darwins way. So in that case, who did make the earth? God did. There is so much order, that one small different variable could set this universe into chaos.

&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp In conclusion, this paper has proved that Darwinism is neither scientifically nor philosophically correct. It has also demonstrated that there is a God. Because of this, we know that we all have a purpose in life, no matter how small.



Works Cited

Bernhoft, Robin. Confronting Creations Complexities Darwinism Isnt Fit to Survive, This Rock. San Diego, CA: Catholic Answers, Sept. 2003.

Catechism of the Catholic Church, Liberia Editrice Vaticana. Liguori, MO: Liguori Publications, 1994."

I hope I have proven a point!!!

BTW - This paper was written be me (Nathan Waddell), and to copy anything from it, without proper citing, would be plagarism!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

A. Does not care about the people they give their money to.
B. Gives up money because they are forced to.
